data.name: The Monster Breeder Demo
data.detailed_description: This demo represents the Early Access gameplay and will last until the end of the first quest or a maximum of 12 turns.
data.about_the_game: This demo represents the Early Access gameplay and will last until the end of the first quest or a maximum of 12 turns.
data.short_description: This demo represents the Early Access gameplay and will last until the end of the first quest or a maximum of 12 turns.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible
